messages.title: A LOCAL, POSITIVE & CREDIBLE CHOICE FOR BOSWORTH
messages.content: "I live in Hinckley, where I grew up and spent most of my life. It would be an honour to represent our community in parliament as your voice, creating jobs and opportunities for the many."

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An end to the Brexit chaos
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will put the final decision in your hands with a public vote on a new Brexit deal. If you want a deal that protects workers rights & our NHS you'll be able to vote for that. If you want to remain in the EU, you'll be able to vote for that. Labour will immediately carry out the election so Britain can get beyond Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Better NHS services for Hinckley & Bosworth
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will lead the fight in Parliament for better NHS services locally and make the case for a walk-in centre in Hinckley. I will campaign against plans to sell off land at Leicester General Hospital, remove all privatisation from the NHS on day one, introduce free prescriptions for all and scrap NHS parking charges.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle climate change via a green revolution
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will take the climate emergency seriously, ensuring all new homes are carbon neutral by 2022, also creating thousands of jobs in the area through the installation of energy saving measures such as loft insulation and double glazing, renewable and low carbon technologies.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Voters have a choice between yet another Conservative MP from outside the area or a hard-working and effective local Labour MP.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will put the final decision in your hands with a public vote on a new Brexit deal.

community.content: As your MP I would champion local services and fight for high quality well-paid jobs and investment in the area.

leaflet.personalStatement: I live in Hinckley, where I grew up and spent most of my life. It would be an honour to represent our community in parliament as your voice, creating jobs and opportunities for the many.

contactInformation.address: 12 Freemans Lane, Burbage, Hinckley, Leics, LE10 2HF

endorsements.endorsement: I have worked in the NHS since 1986. It's never felt as tough as it has over the last few years. We used to talk about winter pressures, now the winter pressures last all year. If we allow the Tories to continue, it's just going to get worse. I'll be voting for Rick Middleton as a local person to represent us in Parliament. Labour have always been the party for the NHS.

examples: I live in Hinckley, where I grew up and spent most of my life. It would be an honour to represent our community in parliament as your voice, creating jobs and opportunities for the many.
Labour will put the final decision in your hands with a public vote on a new Brexit deal.

I will lead the fight in Parliament for better NHS services locally and make the case for a walk-in centre in Hinckley. I will campaign against plans to sell off land at Leicester General Hospital, remove all privatisation from the NHS on day one, introduce free prescriptions for all and scrap NHS parking charges.

I will take the climate emergency seriously, ensuring all new homes are carbon neutral by 2022, also creating thousands of jobs in the area through the installation of energy saving measures such as loft insulation and double glazing, renewable and low carbon technologies.
Voters have a choice between yet another Conservative MP from outside the area or a hard-working and effective local Labour MP.
As your MP I would champion local services and fight for high quality well-paid jobs and investment in the area.

I have worked in the NHS since 1986. It's never felt as tough as it has over the last few years. We used to talk about winter pressures, now the winter pressures last all year. If we allow the Tories to continue, it's just going to get worse. I'll be voting for Rick Middleton as a local person to represent us in Parliament. Labour have always been the party for the NHS.
Rick Middleton, your local voice. Real change. No more political point scoring.
Voters have a choice between yet another Conservative MP from outside the area or a hard-working and effective local Labour MP.

I have campaigned to keep local services like Barwell Sure Start centre and Hinckley & District Hospital from closure. As your MP I would champion local services and fight for high quality well-paid jobs and investment in the area.
